options.name: Enforcer
options.description: Lose 1 Block and Dodge while gaining +2 Physical Mitigation and +1 Elemental Mitigation.

options.name: Free Action : Pummel
options.description: When you score a True Hit on a Creature, roll a Contested Athletics Check against their Resilience. On a failure, the Creature becomes Stunned.

options.name: Action : Shieldbreaker
options.description: Make an Attack with a Melee Weapon with a 1d4 Bonus Modifier. If your Attack hits, the affected Creature has a Penalty to their next Block Check before the start of their next turn equal to the result of the d4.
